titleStmt.title: Divi Britannici being a remark upon the lives of all the kings of this isle from the year of the world 2855, unto the year of grace 1660 / by Sir Winston Churchill, Kt.
titleStmt.author: Churchill, Winston, Sir, 1620?-1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Roycroft, to be sold by Francis Eglesfield ...,

notesStmt.note: Each of the six divisions preceded by a half-title, not included in paging.
